Texto: 
rales over left chest.
antibiotics.
pa radiograph demonstrates opacity within the left lung that obscures the left heart border and overlies the heart on the lateral image.
pneumonia
any alveolar-filling process to include but not limited to...
-pneumonia
-edema
-hemorrhage
-neoplasm
4 year old female with cough and fever.
